Articles.Content: So I have a rocket orbiting Kerbin and Bob the poor little guy is floating away I have tried all the buttons WSAD to get to it also Shift and Ctrl and it won't work?!?!? Please help!

Hello!

You can get your little guy's RCS pack working with "R", just like with your rocket's RCS. Once the little RCS icon on the navball has lit up, you can use the WASDQE keys to move him around.
Look at his hands, are they holding controls? If not press R to have him grip the jetpack controls.
Hit "R" to turn it on and off. It's basically RCS. if it's on (he's holding the controls) and not working, then you're out of fuel.
Thanks guy's he is now safe and sound!!!
